The Science

How Growmark removes watermarks

Gemini AI applies watermarks using alpha compositing â€” blending a semi-transparent white logo over your image. Growmark inverts this mathematically:

Gemini blends:

watermarked = Î± Ã— white_logo + (1 âˆ’ Î±) Ã— original

Growmark solves:

original = (watermarked âˆ’ Î± Ã— 255) / (1 âˆ’ Î±)
